    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addOrder()
      This method is called when the Add to Order button is pressed and will add the current pizza to the current order list
      void addTopping()
      Adds a chosen topping to the pizza and remove it from the total list of toppings.
      void buttons()
      This method holds what the three buttons on the interface (add, remove, and order) should do when they are clicked
      void flavListener()
      This method is used when the user interacts with the flavor spinner and selects a flavor option.
      protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      This will initialize what the Chicago Activity will look like / behave on creation
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected​(android.view.MenuItem item)  
      void removeTopping()
      Removes a chosen topping from the pizza and returns it back to the total list of toppings.
      (package private) void selectBBQChicken()
      When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a BBQ Chicken pizza is structured.
      (package private) void selectBuildYourOwn()
      When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Build Your Own pizza is structured.
      (package private) void selectDeluxe()
      When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Deluxe Pizza pizza is structured.
      (package private) void selectMeatzza()
      When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Meatzza pizza is structured.
      void sizeListener()
      This method is used when the user interacts with the size spinner and selects a size option.
      void startSpinnerPos()
      Initializes the flavor spinner

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This will initialize what the Chicago Activity will look like / behave on creation
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState -

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected​(android.view.MenuItem item)
        Overrides:
        onOptionsItemSelected in class android.app.Activity

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder()
        This method is called when the Add to Order button is pressed and will add the current pizza to the current order list

      • startSpinnerPos

        public void startSpinnerPos()
        Initializes the flavor spinner

      • flavListener

        public void flavListener()
        This method is used when the user interacts with the flavor spinner and selects a flavor option. When one of the flavors is selected, it will update the flavor of the pizza by calling the respective pizza method.

      • sizeListener

        public void sizeListener()
        This method is used when the user interacts with the size spinner and selects a size option. When one of the sizes is selected, it will update the size of the pizza and price.

      • buttons

        public void buttons()
        This method holds what the three buttons on the interface (add, remove, and order) should do when they are clicked

      • addTopping

        public void addTopping()
        Adds a chosen topping to the pizza and remove it from the total list of toppings.

      • removeTopping

        public void removeTopping()
        Removes a chosen topping from the pizza and returns it back to the total list of toppings.

      • selectDeluxe

        void selectDeluxe()
        When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Deluxe Pizza pizza is structured. Also disables the add/remove toppings buttons because the toppings should already preset.

      • selectBBQChicken

        void selectBBQChicken()
        When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a BBQ Chicken pizza is structured. Also disables the add/remove toppings buttons because the toppings should already preset.

      • selectMeatzza

        void selectMeatzza()
        When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Meatzza pizza is structured. Also disables the add/remove toppings buttons because the toppings should already preset.

      • selectBuildYourOwn

        void selectBuildYourOwn()
        When called it changes the different text boxes to the needed toppings,crust and prices according to how a Build Your Own pizza is structured. This method also enables the add/remove buttons so that the user may select/deselect up to 7 toppings.
